SELECT a.user_id AS userId, b.bio AS bio, b.uuid AS uuid, IF(a.my_nickname = '', b.nickname, a.my_nickname) AS nickname, b.avatar_file_id AS avatarFileId, a.mute_flag AS muteFlag, a.manage_flag AS manageFlag, IF(c.belong_id = a.user_id, TRUE, FALSE) AS belongFlag, IF(d.id IS NULL, FALSE, TRUE) AS blockFlag, a.create_time AS createTime
FROM base_im_group_ref_user a
LEFT JOIN base_user_info b ON b.id = a.user_id
LEFT JOIN base_im_group c ON c.id = a.group_id
LEFT JOIN base_im_block d ON d.source_id = a.group_id AND d.source_type = #{sourceType} AND d.user_id = a.user_id
WHERE a.group_id = #{dto.groupId}
AND b.id IS NOT NULL
AND (a.my_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%') OR b.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%') OR b.uuid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%'))
